channel.title: vRealize Operations on davidstamen.com
channel.description: Recent content in vRealize Operations on davidstamen.com

item.title: Using the Pure Storage vRealize Operations Management Pack
item.description: When it comes to monitoring your Pure Storage environment, Pure1 is an amazing tool. However, some customers have an investment in the VMware vRealize Suite and wish to look at some of the Pure Storage Array information within their vRealize Operations environment.
